title: Direction of electric field and force on electron

content.description: In a region of space, a spherically symmetric electric potential is given as a function of r, the distance from the origin, by the equation ùëâ (ùëü) = ùëòùëü2 , where ùëò is a positive constant.
content.question: What is the direction of the electric field at a point a distance r0 from the origin and the direction of the force on an electron placed at this point?

choices.label:
Electric Field: Toward origin
Force on Electron: Toward origin

Electric Field: Toward origin
Force on Electron: Away from origin

Electric Field: Away from origin
Force on Electron: Toward origin

Electric Field: Away from origin
Force on Electron: Away from origin

Electric Field: Undefined, since the field is zero
Force on Electron: Undefined, since the force is zero

content.answer:
Electric Field: Toward origin
Force on Electron: Away from origin
